User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Bhashantar Bharati application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

isBlocked.description: Indicates if the user's account is blocked.

AdminRole.title: Admin Role
AdminRole.description: Represents an admin role grant. The document ID is the user's UID.

assignedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the admin role was assigned.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including username, email, and block status.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: A collection where the existence of a document indicates a user has admin privileges. The document ID is the user's UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure separates user data from role data. User information is in `/users/{userId}`. Admin roles are managed in `/roles_admin/{userId}`, where a document's existence grants admin rights. This allows for secure and distinct security rules for user data access and role management.
